Package Controller

Class MiscMethods

java.lang.Object
Controller.MiscMethods
public class MiscMethods extends Object
Represents the miscellaneous controller methods to be used across the entire application.
Since:
2022-10-23
Version:
1.0

    • readChoice

      public static int readChoice(int i, int j)
      A method to enter a particular int from a range between i to j
      Parameters:
      i - the lower threshold of allowable int to be entered
      j - the upper threshold of allowable int to be entered
      Returns:
      int as a choice

    • addLinebreaks

      public static String addLinebreaks(String input, int maxLineLength, int lengthOfSpace)
      This method is to add line breaks based on lengthOfSpace and to add new line based on maxLineLength
      Parameters:
      input - the original String to display
      maxLineLength - the max num of chars per line, if exceed, \n into new line
      lengthOfSpace - the empty spaces added from the String
      Returns:
      the updated String with line breaks

    • dateInput

      public static Date dateInput()
      This method parses a date String into the Date class format
      Returns:
      a Date class

    • enterDateString

      public static String enterDateString()
      dateInput() calls this method for the user to enter String of date
      Returns:
      String

    • dateOutput

      public static String dateOutput(Date date)
      This function converts a Date class into a SimpleDateFormat String
      Parameters:
      date - the input Date class
      Returns:
      the converted Date into a String
